title: AÑADIR CUMPLEAÑOS EN CALENDARIO
content:
Hola. Estoy añadiendo los cumpleaños en el calendario, en el espacio que hay debajo de la fecha. Si no hay eventos "fijos", como Festivos en España, lo hago sin problema. Pero si hay algún evento de ese tipo, no me deja, sale error, con un mensaje que no consigo entender.

"Código de estado: 2147500037, La solicitud no puede ser procesada. Server Replied with 403 Si ve este mensaje tras posponer u ocultar un recordatorio y es para un calendario en el que no quiere añadir o editar eventos, puede marcar este calendario como de solo lectura para evitar este comportamiento en el futuro. Para ello, acceda a las propiedades del calendario haciendo clic con el botón derecho en este calendario en la lista de las vistas de calendario o tareas.

Y lo que me gustaría es dejar los cumpleaños fijos, para los años sucesivos. ¿Me podéis ayudar? Muchas gracias.
creator: luispacoramos

title: Cannot delete emails from Microsoft 365 email account
content:
Hi, As the title suggests, I am unable to delete emails from my work Microsoft account.

On attempting to delete an email, the following message is displayed:

"The current operation on "Inbox" did not succeed. The mail server for account [email] responded: [TRYCREATE] The destination mailbox could not be found."

Checking the account settings, it seems Thunderbird cannot see the "Deleted Items" folder (it only shows Inbox and Drafts). I have attached images to show what I mean, comparing with a personal Microsoft/Outlook account where it sends deleted email to the correct place.

Using the latest Thunderbird version that is available on the Microsoft Store version on Windows 11. (115.9.0) I have tried removing and re-adding the account yet the problem persists. Any troubleshooting ideas welcome!

Bij de installatie van Thunderbird wil ik mijn account instellen. Dit is een account op one.com. Het e-mailadres is info@pepel.be. Wanneer ik druk op doorgaan geeft thunderbird een foutmelding : Fout bij aanmaken van account : de inkomende server bestaat al. Hier kan ik dus niet verder. Heb al geprobeerd om opnieuw te beginnen: d.i. geen oplossing Bij ONE.COM support hebben ze geen raad en verwijzen mij door naar Thunderbird support.

Graag een uitgeschreven oplossing aub. Mag verstuurd worden naar forgatz.kurk@telenet.be Bedankt voor de hulp . Patrick
creator: irene.weygaard

title: Thunderbird started showing "x messages downloaded" but no new messages are displayed
content:
This is a recent change, and in fact I don't *think* there's a "missing message" problem after reading and watching for a couple of days. I *think* something has changed and Thunderbird reports having "downloaded x messages" even if it *just downloaded them a moment ago*.

So it may download 5 messages, then a few seconds later you hit the Get Messages button, and there are no actual new messages but it still reports "5 messages downloaded" but nothing new is shown. As of last week, it would have reported "there are no new messages" when you hit that button soon after having received messages.

So I think:

  • there is no serious messages-missing problem
  • there is a disconcerting issue with a change in how Thunderbird reports status where a message arrival state is "sticky" and for some duration after getting new messages it will re-report the count of the last receipt when asked to download when there are no new messages.

I could be wrong about either of these, but there's a definite change in a behavior that I'd gotten very accustomed to. It is alarming to hit the button, see a message regarding some number of new messages, and receive none.

I'm guessing others, like me, spent some time panicking, searching forums, repairing the inbox... I think I'm as interested in confirming that there isn't a bigger problem as I am in getting back to the accustomed behavior.

Hope this is useful; thanks for your attention!

Currently on 115.11.0 (64-bit) on Windows 11; first occurred at least one version prior.
creator: jesse.ransom
